ProductInfo.Features:
GW9216HB: HD-SDI High Definition 16 Channel DVR, 1080P, HD/WD1resolution, 4ch SDI + 12ch D1, Video 16in/1out, Audio 2in/1out, 4 alarm in/1 out, N9-1. iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. Backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control, iPhone/android viewable
GW848HDSDI: HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Indoor Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDI Video Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 30PCs IR LED
GW56WD: 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens,72 IR LEDs. OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes: GW9216HB DVR with 6TB HD; GW190 - Free 19" CCTV LED monitor with 2xBNC, HDMI and VGA inputs; GWZG13 - Free 15 feet 1.4V HDMI Male - Male;4 x GW848HDSDI - 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera; 12 x GW56WD - 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Camera
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
